replies.body: Mods shouldn't have /vanish because then players won't know if a mod is in a room or not. /report would be used too much. I bet it has been considered and denied. Avicus is a friendly community, and eeveryone should get to see everyone. Also, /vanish doesn't just make a mod invisible, it takes their name from the game. For example, there name wont be on tab, you can type tab mid-way typing their name, and you can't msg a mod when wanting to talk to them privately. /nick would be worse, for one, msg would be more confusing without /realname, two, typing /realname then msg would take longer. and three, we would recognize some of  the mods on the forums. Sorry mods!

replies.body:
/nick only changes a Moderator's name in-game, not on the forums.
Also, /nick should only be used temporarily when a Moderator is taking reports. 

When a Mod isn't taking a report, they'll change back to their original name. So the confusion (if any) will only last a few minutes at the most. So you shouldn't have to worry about contacting a Moderator. Even if they are /nicked, they'll be back to normal in a few minutes.

But considering we currently don't have /vanish or /nick, you don't have to worry about it at the moment.
